title: The President of the Republic receives a phone call from the Italian Prime Minister
text: The President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune received, Tuesday, a cordial phone call from the Italian Prime Minister, Mr. Mario Draghi, with whom he reviewed the relations between Algeria and Italy on all fronts and the prospects for their promotion and expansion in various fields.

The telephone interview also focused on regional and international issues of common interest, mainly the situation in Libya, the Sahel and Western Sahara, reflecting the traditional convergence of views between the two countries.
